ai-patthana12.4:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana12.4:0.3_0: There are many kinds of perception, such as the previous.
ai-patthana12.4:2.1_0: I didn’t give rise to thought. ...
ai-patthana12.4:2.1_1: for the sake of health, not for the sake of health.
ai-patthana12.4:4.1_0: (These nine discourses should not be expanded in brief.)
